Mayur patil 
       Mayurkpatil9359@gmail.com, Ph: +91-9359229951, Pune 
 
KEY SILKS 
 
 Operating system:- Linux (ubuntu), windows 
 Virtualization Technologies:- VirtualBox, VMware 
 Web servers:-HTTPD, nginx  
 Cloude platform:-AWS(vpc,EC2,S3,Cloudwatch,IAM) 
 frontend technology:- ,HTML(basic) 
 Version Control Tools: Git and GitHub  
 
ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES 
  I am good at managing AWS services such as EC2, S3, VPC, IAM,  and CloudFormation. 
 managed scalable, secure applications using EC2 instances and load balancer. 
 I am good at managing S3 buckets for data storage, backups, and hosting static websites. 
 Automated EC2 instance using EC2 Auto Scaling. 
 I am good at implementing secure VPCs (Virtual Private Cloud) with private and public subnets. 
 Configured IAM roles, users, and policies for secure access control. 
 Managed large-scale data storage solutions using AWS S3 for backup, archiving, and static  
 website  hosting. 
 Implemented Auto Scaling Groups for EC2 instances to ensure high availability. 
 version control using Git (branching, merging). 
 Good at staging, committing, and reverting changes in Git. 
 managing pull requests, code reviews, and resolving merge conflicts. 
 I am good at repository management, including forking, cloning. 
 Familiar with basic Docker commands like docker run, docker build, docker ps, and docker exec. 
 I am good at Linux based infrastructure, ensuring efficient system administration and maintenance. 
 Linux basic login into the system changing users 
 Running commands and getting help. 
 Open, edit and save text files in vi and vim editor 
 Tex processing tool grep, find 
 User administration (creating, modifying, deleting users and groups) 
 Package managing (yum and rpm) 
 Reding and sating permissions on file directories 
 
 
EDUCATION
